name: cosmic-quota
description: An otherworldly VS Code: extension that monitors your Synthetic API quota from the far reaches of space
author: ChrisUFO <chris@charrison.us>

syntheticQuota.apiKey.description: Your Synthetic API key for accessing quota information

syntheticQuota.refreshInterval.description: How often to refresh quota data (in seconds). Default: 5 minutes (300s), Min: 1 minute (60s), Max: 1 hour (3600s)

syntheticQuota.statusBarDisplay.description: What quota information to display in the status bar

syntheticQuota.resetTimeDisplay.description: How to display the quota reset time in tooltips

syntheticQuota.statusBarCountdown.description: Show countdown to reset in status bar when quota is depleted (100% used)

syntheticQuota.showCompactAnalytics.description: Show predictive analytics in the status bar (trends, burn rate, depletion forecast)

enumDescriptions: Auto: Show depletion when critical (90%+), trend when elevated (70%+), burn rate when moderate (50%+)
Always show depletion time remaining (e.g., '2h left')
Disable compact analytics in status bar
syntheticQuota.compactAnalytics.description: What type of predictive analytics to display in the status bar

syntheticQuota.trackSessionUsage.description: Track and display session usage (quota consumed since this VS Code: window opened)

syntheticQuota.warningThreshold.description: Usage percentage that triggers warning status (orange icon)

syntheticQuota.criticalThreshold.description: Usage percentage that triggers critical status (red icon)

syntheticQuota.lowQuotaNotificationThres.description: Show a notification when remaining quota drops below this percentage. Set to 0 to disable notifications.
